page.title: 19INDUSTRY IN REDHILL
page.content:
{FULLERS EARTH}is a type of clay and has been extracted from around the{ {NUTFIELD}area for thousands of years. Due to it's high absorbtive power it has many uses; making pet litter, clarifying wine and in the refining of oil. {LAPORTE INDUSTRIES LTD.}extract the clay by open-cast quarrying. The surface soil is removed and the clay is dug out. This method is very economical but it leaves many large holes behind as well as altering the shape of the land. However LAPORTE INDUSTRIES try to restore the landscape to it's original condition wherever possible.
{BRITISH INDUSTRIAL SANDS}also extract large amounts of SILVER SAND from the REDHILL/MERSTHAM area. The sand is used in GLASSMAKING. One of the holes left by the quarrying has been flooded
